Your Last Chance for Exclusive Savings!
Sign your contract by December 15 to receive low community pricing!
Exclusive savings end on December 15. Act now!
Enrollment for the extended special group pricing from Astrum Solar has ended. Thank you for your interest in the program! If you are considering going solar with Astrum Solar, you have until December 15 to sign your contract and take advantage of the low community pricing provided by the program.
You do not want to miss out on these savings. The overwhelming support and enthusiasm for Solarize Lexington-Bedford resulted in Tier 5 pricing, the lowest available! This means that, in addition to federal and state incentives, you are able to take advantage of the lowest pricing possible through the program. Now is the best time to go solar.
Ready to go solar? Here is the next step. Contact your Solar Consultant today to discuss your system and move forward with signing your contract by December 15. Astrum Solar makes switching to solar easy, turnkey and worry-free. Let us help you start saving today!
Have a general question? Contact your solar coaches: Marcia Gens (solarizelexington@gmail.com <mailto:solarizelexington@gmail.com>) or Dave Enos (solarizebedford@gmail.com <mailto:solarizebedford@gmail.com>).
